p: In the present study, auxin herbicide picloram was the best auxin to induce callus due to toxicity effects of other auxins towards the plant cell. Kumar et al. [ 33] and Moura et al. [ 34] reported similar studies, in which picloram showed a better callus induction in Triticum aestivum L. and Eucalyptus grandis x E. urophylla. In contrast, a study by Binte Mostafiz and Wagiran [ 19] showed that picloram displayed the lowest callus induction percentage compared to dicamba and 2,4-D in Indica rice MR219. A study by Akram and Aftab [ 35] found that the addition of picloram into the culture medium failed to induce callus from Tectona grandis L.
